00062 class MyWindow : public Fl_Double_Window {
00063 public:
00064   MyWindow(int w, int h)
00065     : Fl_Double_Window(w, h, "Spectrum Display")
00066     , menu_bar_(0,0,w,20)
00067     , input_(0, h-30, w, 30, "label")
00068     , specDisplay_(20, 20, w-40, h-50)
00069     , counter_(0)
00070     // , disp_(20, 40, w-40, h-40, "Display") 
00071   {
00072     menu_bar_.add("File/Quit", FL_CTRL+'q', Quit_CB);
00073     end();
00074     this->callback(Quit_CB);
00075   }
00076   virtual ~MyWindow() {}
00077 
00078   void set_fMin(double fMin) { specDisplay_.set_fMin(1e3*fMin); }
00079   void set_fMax(double fMax) { specDisplay_.set_fMax(1e3*fMax); }
00080 
00081   void set_sMin(double sMin) { specDisplay_.set_sMin(sMin); }
00082   void set_sMax(double sMax) { specDisplay_.set_sMax(sMax); }
00083 
00084   spectrum_display& get_spec_display() { return specDisplay_; }
00085 
00086 protected:
00087   static void Quit_CB(Fl_Widget *, void *) {
00088     Fl::lock();
00089     static char msg[1024];
00090     sprintf(msg, "quit");
00091     Fl::awake(msg);
00092     Fl::unlock();
00093   }
00094 private:
00095   Fl_Menu_Bar menu_bar_;
00096   Fl_Input    input_;
00097   spectrum_display specDisplay_;
00098   int         counter_;
00099   // Fl_Text_Display disp_;
00100   // Fl_Text_Buffer buff_;
00101 } ;

00104 class test_proc {
00105 public:
00106 #ifdef USE_CUDA      
00107   typedef FFT::CUFFTTransform fft_type;
00108 #else
00109   typedef FFT::FFTWTransform<double> fft_type;
00110 #endif
00111 
00112   test_proc(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00113     : w_(1200,400)
00114     , fftw_(1024, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_ESTIMATE)
00115     , host_(config.get<std::string>("server.<xmlattr>.host"))
00116     , port_(config.get<std::string>("server.<xmlattr>.port")) {
00117     filter_.add(Filter::LowPass<frequency_vector<double> >::make(1.0, 15));
00118     w_.show();
00119     w_.set_fMin(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fMin_kHz"));
00120     w_.set_fMax(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fMax_kHz"));
00121     w_.set_sMin(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.sMin_dB"));
00122     w_.set_sMax(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.sMax_dB"));
00123   }
00124 
00125   void process_iq(processor::service_iq::sptr sp,
00126                   std::vector<std::complex<double> >::const_iterator i0,
00127                   std::vector<std::complex<double> >::const_iterator i1) {
00128     const size_t length(std::distance(i0, i1));
00129 #if 0
00130     std::cout << "process_iq nS=" << std::distance(i0, i1) 
00131               << " " << sp->id()
00132               << " " << sp->approx_ptime()
00133               << " " << sp->sample_rate_Hz()
00134               << " " << sp->center_frequency_Hz()
00135               << " " << sp->offset_ppb()
00136               << " length=" << length
00137               << std::endl;
00138 #endif
00139     if (length != fftw_.size())
00140       fftw_.resize(length);
00141     fftw_.transformRange(i0, i1, FFT::WindowFunction::Blackman<double>(length));
00142     const FFTSpectrum<fft_type> s(fftw_, sp->sample_rate_Hz(), sp->center_frequency_Hz());
00143     const double f_min(sp->center_frequency_Hz() - sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00144     const double f_max(sp->center_frequency_Hz() + sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00145     frequency_vector<double> ps(f_min, f_max, s, std::abs<double>, sp->offset_ppb());
00146     if (filter_.x().empty())
00147       filter_.init(sp->approx_ptime(), ps);
00148     else
00149       filter_.update(sp->approx_ptime(), ps);
00150 
00151     frequency_vector<double> xf(filter_.x());
00152 
00153     Fl::lock();
00154     const std::string window_title(str(boost::format("%s @%s:%s") % sp->stream_name() % host_ % port_));
00155     w_.label(window_title.c_str());
00156     w_.get_spec_display().insert_spec(ps.apply(s2db()), xf.apply(s2db()), sp);
00157     static char msg[1024];
00158     sprintf(msg,"spec_update");
00159     Fl::awake(msg);
00160     Fl::unlock();
00161   }
00162 private:
00163   struct s2db {
00164     double operator()(double c) const {
00165       return 10*std::log10(c);
00166     }
00167   } ;
00168   MyWindow w_;
00169   fft_type fftw_;
00170   Filter::Cascaded<frequency_vector<double> > filter_;
00171   std::string host_;
00172   std::string port_;
00173 //   boost::mutex mutex_;
00174 } ;

00176 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00177 {
00178   // set up command-line options
00179   namespace po = boost::program_options;
00180   po::options_description desc("Allowed options");
00181   desc.add_options()
00182     ("help,?",    "produce help message")
00183     ("version,v", "display version")
00184     ("host,h",     po::value<std::string>()->default_value("127.0.0.1"), "server hostname")
00185     ("port,p",     po::value<std::string>()->default_value("18001"),     "server port")
00186     ("stream,s",   po::value<std::string>()->default_value("DataIQ"),    "stream name")
00187     ("overlap,o",  po::value<double>()->default_value(   0.),  "buffer overlap (%)")
00188     ("delta_t,dt", po::value<double>()->default_value(   1.),  "dt (sec)")
00189     ("fMin_kHz",   po::value<double>()->default_value(   0),   "fMin (kHz)")
00190     ("fMax_kHz",   po::value<double>()->default_value(  40e3), "fMax (kHz)")
00191     ("sMin_dB",    po::value<double>()->default_value( -70),  "sMin (dB)")
00192     ("sMax_dB",    po::value<double>()->default_value( -40),  "sMax (dB)");
00193 
00194   po::variables_map vm;
00195   try {
00196     po::store(po::parse_command_line(argc, argv, desc), vm);
00197     po::notify(vm);
00198     
00199     if (vm.count("help")) {
00200       std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00201       return 1;
00202     }
00203     if (vm.count("version")) {
00204       std::cout << SVN_VERSION_STRING << std::endl;
00205       return 1;
00206     }
00207   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00208     std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00209     std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00210     return 1;
00211   }
00212   
00213   // logger initialization
00214   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", "fltk_spec");
00215 
00216   try {
00217     // make up ptree config
00218     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00219     config.put("server.<xmlattr>.host", vm["host"].as<std::string>());
00220     config.put("server.<xmlattr>.port", vm["port"].as<std::string>());
00221     config.put("Repack.<xmlattr>.bufferLength_sec", vm["delta_t"].as<double>());
00222     config.put("Repack.<xmlattr>.overlap_percent", vm["overlap"].as<double>());
00223     config.put("<xmlattr>.fMin_kHz", vm["fMin_kHz"].as<double>());
00224     config.put("<xmlattr>.fMax_kHz", vm["fMax_kHz"].as<double>());
00225     config.put("<xmlattr>.sMin_dB", vm["sMin_dB"].as<double>());
00226     config.put("<xmlattr>.sMax_dB", vm["sMax_dB"].as<double>());
00227 
00228     // FLTK initialization
00229     Fl::visual(FL_RGB);
00230     Fl::lock();
00231 
00232     // connect to server
00233     const std::string stream_name(vm["stream"].as<std::string>());
00234     network::client::client<network::iq_adapter<repack_processor<test_proc> > > c(config);
00235 
00236     const std::set<std::string> streams(c.ls());
00237     if (streams.find(stream_name) != streams.end())
00238       ASSERT_THROW(c.connect_to(stream_name) == true);
00239     else
00240       throw std::runtime_error(str(boost::format("stream '%s' is not available")
00241                                    % stream_name));
00242     // run io_service in a thread
00243     boost::asio::io_service& io_service(network::get_io_service());
00244     typedef boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> thread_sptr;
00245     thread_sptr tp(new boost::thread(boost::bind(&boost::asio::io_service::run, &io_service)));
00246 
00247     // start client
00248     c.start();
00249 
00250     // FLTK event loop
00251     while (Fl::wait() > 0) {
00252       const char* msg(static_cast<const char *>(Fl::thread_message()));
00253       if (msg) {
00254         if (std::string(msg) == "quit") break;
00255       }
00256     }
00257     c.stop();
00258 //     io_service.stop();
00259 //     tp->detach();
00260     tp->timed_join(boost::posix_time::seconds(2));
00261   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00262     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00263     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00264     return 1;
00265   }
00266   return 0;
00267 }
